/Users/colinfrick/Documents/CineLinker/p.serviceRawFile:
service: cinelinker-api

provider:
  name: aws
  runtime: nodejs20.x
  region: us-west-2
  environment:
    NODE_ENV: production

functions:
  api:
    handler: src/index.handler
    events:
      - http:
          path: /api/{proxy+}
          method: any
          cors: true
    environment:
      NODE_ENV: production
    timeout: 28
    memorySize: 1024

build:
  esbuild:
    bundle: true
    minify: true
    target: "node20"
    platform: "node"
    define:
      'process.env.NODE_ENV': '"production"'
